alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 9:27PM CDT until June 19 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Orleans Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Jefferson Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 926 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arabi, or 7 miles east of Metairie, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Metairie and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 222 and 231, and between mile markers 239 and 240. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. This warning is the the gust front and not a storm...REPEAT this is just the outflow from storms. Bayou Beinvenue reported a wind gust of 64 mph. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
